page.title: 01L./Heath,Hamble,Warsash area
page.content: This area has a number of interesting features.Locks Heath is best known for its{strawberry growing industry} dating back to the last century.It also boasts one of the few{hydroponic {tomato growing}nurseries in Europe. Hamble is a famous centre for{water {sports}and has several marinas displaying thousands of yachts.Many of these have competed in the World's leading sailing events.It also has one of the few remaining{single man {ferries},available to transport you between Hamble and Warsash on any day. It was the scene of Chay Blythe's triumphant return after having sailed around the world. Lying over the river from Hamble is Warsash,another boating centre of the South.It has links with the Normandy Invasion,being the departure point for many thousands of troops.
